thread.title: Music Stars React to Drummer Clyde Stubblefield's Death
thread.title_full: Music Stars React to Drummer Clyde Stubblefield's Death

author: NHHMS
title: Music Stars React to Drummer Clyde Stubblefield's Death
text:
— Living Colour (@LivingColour) February 18, 2017 A huge chunk of funk history has passed on to the ages. RIP to the GREAT Clyde Stubblefield. #FunkyDrummer pic.twitter.com/sghypFyVXh 
— Christian McBride (@mcbridesworld) February 19, 2017 Damn!! We lost the Funky Drummer #Rip Clyde stubblefield the most in pocket,the most sampled and by far the dopest sounding drummer eva! —- pic.twitter.com/pcma3l0DP4 
— Jermaine Dupri (@jermainedupri) February 19, 2017 Every groove this man laid down, you felt and loved. Rest in power to a true pioneer of soul. —- #clydestubblefield pic.twitter.com/lX8L1rQ6Py 
— just call me Andy (@AndersonPaak) February 18, 2017 RIP the funky drummer Clyde Stubblefield pic.twitter.com/cEiIJje6Rv RIP the OG Funky Drummer Clyde Stubblefield. — 
This one hurts. 
— Just Blaze (@JustBlaze) February 18, 2017 he gave the drummer more than some…. Thank you for the breaks Clyde Stubblefield RIP https://t.co/WpfOdXqbTJ 
— Gilles Peterson (@gillespeterson) February 18, 2017 RIP Clyde Stubblefield. The Man who played the drum pattern that created Hip Hop. (Funky Drummer) #GOAT 
— Turntable Whisperer (@DJScratch) February 18, 2017 Just heard the sad news that the world lost Clyde Stubblefield yesterday. What a loss. What a sweet , brilliant talent. God speed sir.
